title: Bug 220686unsynchronized access to WeakHashMap
description: Bug 220686unsynchronized access to WeakHashMap Created attachment 90955 [details]patch to World.javaBuild ID: M200710231652Steps To Reproduce:1. org.aspectj.weaver.World.expendableMap is defined as a java.util.WeakHashMap2. java.util.WeakHashMap is not thread safe3.
OB: we have observed that expendableMap can be updated concurrently by multiple threads under load which will corrupt the internal hashmap structure resulting in infinite loops when get() is calledMore information:
